name: GianniQuest
description:
Have you ever wondered what lies beneath the plumbing of the average town in Arizona?

Have you ever wondered what it's like to be Gianni?

Have you ever wondered who Gianni even is?

This game contains the answers to those questions, and much, much more.

Please note that if you find a particular section too challenging, you can go back to the main menu, select "manage your progress", and skip any level by clicking the box next to it.
